org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render
Class AxisPanel

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.AbstractPanel
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.AxisPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GssElement, Panel, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DomainAxisPanel, LegendAxisPanel, OverviewAxisPanel, RangeAxisPanel
public abstract class AxisPanel
extends AbstractPanel
implements GssElement, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

Base class for all axis panels, which are panels that surround the center plot panel. 1 or more axis panels can be added to a CompositeAxisPanel.
